00097 {
00098         return inertia->m_invInertiaWorld;

00102 
00103 static const b3Vector3& getLinearVelocity(b3RigidBodyData* rb)
00104 {
00105         return rb->m_linVel;
00106 }
00107 
00108 static const b3Vector3& getAngularVelocity(b3RigidBodyData* rb)
00109 {
00110         return rb->m_angVel;
00111 }
00112 
00113 b3Vector3 getVelocityInLocalPoint(b3RigidBodyData* rb, const b3Vector3& rel_pos)
00114 {
00115         //we also calculate lin/ang velocity for kinematic objects
00116         return getLinearVelocity(rb) + getAngularVelocity(rb).cross(rel_pos);
00117         
00118 }

00122 b3GpuPgsConstraintSolver::b3GpuPgsConstraintSolver (cl_context ctx, cl_device_id device, cl_command_queue queue,bool usePgs)
00123 {
00124         m_usePgs = usePgs;
00125         m_gpuData = new b3GpuPgsJacobiSolverInternalData();
00126         m_gpuData->m_context = ctx;
00127         m_gpuData->m_device = device;
00128         m_gpuData->m_queue = queue;
00129 
00130         m_gpuData->m_prefixScan = new b3PrefixScanCL(ctx,device,queue);
00131 
00132         m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRowOffsets = new b3OpenCLArray<unsigned int>(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_queue);
00133 
00134         m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies = new b3OpenCLArray<b3GpuSolverBody>(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_queue);
00135         m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints = new b3OpenCLArray<b3BatchConstraint>(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_queue);
00136         m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRows = new b3OpenCLArray<b3GpuSolverConstraint>(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_queue);
00137         m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1 = new b3OpenCLArray<unsigned int>(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_queue);
00138         cl_int errNum=0;
00139 
00140         {
00141                 cl_program prog = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLProgramFromString(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_device,solveConstraintRowsCL,&errNum,"",B3_JOINT_SOLVER_PATH);
00142                 //cl_program prog = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLProgramFromString(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_device,0,&errNum,"",B3_JOINT_SOLVER_PATH,true);
00143                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00144                 m_gpuData->m_solveJointConstraintRowsKernels = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_gpuData->m_context, m_gpuData->m_device,solveConstraintRowsCL, "solveJointConstraintRows",&errNum,prog);
00145                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00146                 m_gpuData->m_initSolverBodiesKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_device,solveConstraintRowsCL,"initSolverBodies",&errNum,prog);
00147                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00148                 m_gpuData->m_getInfo1Kernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_device,solveConstraintRowsCL,"getInfo1Kernel",&errNum,prog);
00149                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00150                 m_gpuData->m_initBatchConstraintsKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_device,solveConstraintRowsCL,"initBatchConstraintsKernel",&errNum,prog);
00151                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00152                 m_gpuData->m_getInfo2Kernel= b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_device,solveConstraintRowsCL,"getInfo2Kernel",&errNum,prog);
00153                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00154                 m_gpuData->m_writeBackVelocitiesKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_device,solveConstraintRowsCL,"writeBackVelocitiesKernel",&errNum,prog);
00155                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00156                 m_gpuData->m_breakViolatedConstraintsKernel = b3OpenCLUtils::compileCLKernelFromString(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_device,solveConstraintRowsCL,"breakViolatedConstraintsKernel",&errNum,prog);
00157                 b3Assert(errNum==CL_SUCCESS);
00158 
00159                 
00160                 
00161 
00162                 clReleaseProgram(prog);
00163         }
00164 
00165 
00166 }
00167 
00168 b3GpuPgsConstraintSolver::~b3GpuPgsConstraintSolver ()
00169 {
00170         clReleaseKernel(m_gpuData->m_solveJointConstraintRowsKernels);
00171         clReleaseKernel(m_gpuData->m_initSolverBodiesKernel);
00172         clReleaseKernel(m_gpuData->m_getInfo1Kernel);
00173         clReleaseKernel(m_gpuData->m_initBatchConstraintsKernel);
00174         clReleaseKernel(m_gpuData->m_getInfo2Kernel);
00175         clReleaseKernel(m_gpuData->m_writeBackVelocitiesKernel);
00176         clReleaseKernel(m_gpuData->m_breakViolatedConstraintsKernel);
00177 
00178         delete m_gpuData->m_prefixScan;
00179         delete m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRowOffsets;
00180         delete m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies;
00181         delete m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints;
00182         delete m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRows;
00183         delete m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1;
00184 
00185         delete m_gpuData;
00186 }

00207 b3Scalar b3GpuPgsConstraintSolver::solveGroupCacheFriendlySetup(b3OpenCLArray<b3RigidBodyData>* gpuBodies, b3OpenCLArray<b3InertiaData>* gpuInertias, int numBodies, b3OpenCLArray<b3GpuGenericConstraint>* gpuConstraints,int numConstraints,const b3ContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
00208 {
00209         B3_PROFILE("GPU solveGroupCacheFriendlySetup");
00210         batchConstraints.resize(numConstraints);
00211         m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->resize(numConstraints);
00212         m_staticIdx = -1;
00213         m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations = 0;
00214 
00215 
00216         /*      m_gpuData->m_gpuBodies->resize(numBodies);
00217         m_gpuData->m_gpuBodies->copyFromHostPointer(bodies,numBodies);
00218 
00219         b3OpenCLArray<b3InertiaData> gpuInertias(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_queue);
00220         gpuInertias.resize(numBodies);
00221         gpuInertias.copyFromHostPointer(inertias,numBodies);
00222         */
00223 
00224         m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies->resize(numBodies);
00225 
00226 
00227         m_tmpSolverBodyPool.resize(numBodies);
00228         {
00229                 
00230                 if (useGpuInitSolverBodies)
00231                 {
00232                         B3_PROFILE("m_initSolverBodiesKernel");
00233 
00234                         b3LauncherCL launcher(m_gpuData->m_queue,m_gpuData->m_initSolverBodiesKernel,"m_initSolverBodiesKernel");
00235                         launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies->getBufferCL());
00236                         launcher.setBuffer(gpuBodies->getBufferCL());
00237                         launcher.setConst(numBodies);
00238                         launcher.launch1D(numBodies);
00239                         clFinish(m_gpuData->m_queue);
00240 
00241                         //                      m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies->copyToHost(m_tmpSolverBodyPool);
00242                 } else
00243                 {
00244                         gpuBodies->copyToHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuBodies);
00245                         for (int i=0;i<numBodies;i++)
00246                         {
00247 
00248                                 b3RigidBodyData& body = m_gpuData->m_cpuBodies[i];
00249                                 b3GpuSolverBody& solverBody = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i];
00250                                 initSolverBody(i,&solverBody,&body);
00251                                 solverBody.m_originalBodyIndex = i;
00252                         }
00253                         m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies->copyFromHost(m_tmpSolverBodyPool);
00254                 }
00255         }
00256 
00257 //      int totalBodies = 0;
00258         int totalNumRows = 0;
00259         //b3RigidBody* rb0=0,*rb1=0;
00260         //if (1)
00261         {
00262                 {
00263 
00264 
00265                         //                      int i;
00266 
00267                         m_tmpConstraintSizesPool.resizeNoInitialize(numConstraints);
00268 
00269                         //                      b3OpenCLArray<b3GpuGenericConstraint> gpuConstraints(m_gpuData->m_context,m_gpuData->m_queue);
00270 
00271 
00272                         if (useGpuInfo1)
00273                         {
00274                                 B3_PROFILE("info1 and init batchConstraint");
00275                                 
00276                                 m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1->resize(numConstraints);
00277 
00278                                 
00279                                 if (1)
00280                                 {
00281                                         B3_PROFILE("getInfo1Kernel");
00282 
00283                                         b3LauncherCL launcher(m_gpuData->m_queue,m_gpuData->m_getInfo1Kernel,"m_getInfo1Kernel");
00284                                         launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1->getBufferCL());
00285                                         launcher.setBuffer(gpuConstraints->getBufferCL());
00286                                         launcher.setConst(numConstraints);
00287                                         launcher.launch1D(numConstraints);
00288                                         clFinish(m_gpuData->m_queue);
00289                                 }
00290 
00291                                 if (m_gpuData->m_batchSizes.size()==0)
00292                                 {
00293                                         B3_PROFILE("initBatchConstraintsKernel");
00294 
00295                                         m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRowOffsets->resize(numConstraints);
00296                                         unsigned int total=0;
00297                                         m_gpuData->m_prefixScan->execute(*m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1,*m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRowOffsets,numConstraints,&total);
00298                                         unsigned int lastElem = m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1->at(numConstraints-1);
00299                                         totalNumRows = total+lastElem;
00300 
00301                                         {
00302                                                 B3_PROFILE("init batch constraints");
00303                                                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_gpuData->m_queue,m_gpuData->m_initBatchConstraintsKernel,"m_initBatchConstraintsKernel");
00304                                                 launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1->getBufferCL());
00305                                                 launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRowOffsets->getBufferCL());
00306                                                 launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->getBufferCL());
00307                                                 launcher.setBuffer(gpuConstraints->getBufferCL());
00308                                                 launcher.setBuffer(gpuBodies->getBufferCL());
00309                                                 launcher.setConst(numConstraints);
00310                                                 launcher.launch1D(numConstraints);
00311                                                 clFinish(m_gpuData->m_queue);
00312                                         }
00313                                         //assume the batching happens on CPU, so copy the data
00314                                         m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->copyToHost(batchConstraints);
00315                                 }
00316                         } 
00317                         else
00318                         {
00319                                 totalNumRows  = 0;
00320                                 gpuConstraints->copyToHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints);
00321                                 //calculate the total number of contraint rows
00322                                 for (int i=0;i<numConstraints;i++)
00323                                 {
00324                                         unsigned int& info1= m_tmpConstraintSizesPool[i];
00325                                         //                                      unsigned int info1;
00326                                         if (m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints[i].isEnabled())
00327                                         {
00328 
00329                                                 m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints[i].getInfo1(&info1,&m_gpuData->m_cpuBodies[0]);
00330                                         } else
00331                                         {
00332                                                 info1 = 0;
00333                                         }
00334                                         
00335                                         totalNumRows += info1;
00336                                 }
00337 
00338                                 m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->copyFromHost(batchConstraints);
00339                                 m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1->copyFromHost(m_tmpConstraintSizesPool);
00340 
00341                         }
00342                         m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(totalNumRows);
00343                         m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRows->resize(totalNumRows);
00344                         
00345                         //                      b3GpuConstraintArray            verify;
00346 
00347                         if (useGpuInfo2)
00348                         {
00349                                 {
00350                                                 B3_PROFILE("getInfo2Kernel");
00351                                                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_gpuData->m_queue,m_gpuData->m_getInfo2Kernel,"m_getInfo2Kernel");
00352                                                 launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRows->getBufferCL());
00353                                                 launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1->getBufferCL());
00354                                                 launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRowOffsets->getBufferCL());
00355                                                 launcher.setBuffer(gpuConstraints->getBufferCL());
00356                                                 launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->getBufferCL());
00357                                                 launcher.setBuffer(gpuBodies->getBufferCL());
00358                                                 launcher.setBuffer(gpuInertias->getBufferCL());
00359                                                 launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies->getBufferCL());
00360                                                 launcher.setConst(infoGlobal.m_timeStep);
00361                                                 launcher.setConst(infoGlobal.m_erp);
00362                                                 launcher.setConst(infoGlobal.m_globalCfm);
00363                                                 launcher.setConst(infoGlobal.m_damping);
00364                                                 launcher.setConst(infoGlobal.m_numIterations);
00365                                                 launcher.setConst(numConstraints);
00366                                                 launcher.launch1D(numConstraints);
00367                                                 clFinish(m_gpuData->m_queue);
00368 
00369                                                 if (m_gpuData->m_batchSizes.size()==0)
00370                                                         m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->copyToHost(batchConstraints);
00371                                                 //m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRows->copyToHost(verify);
00372                                                 //m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRows->copyToHost(m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool);
00373 
00374                                                 
00375 
00376                                         }
00377                         } 
00378                         else
00379                         {
00380                         
00381                                 gpuInertias->copyToHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuInertias);
00382 
00384                         
00385                                 for (int i=0;i<numConstraints;i++)
00386                                 {
00387                                         const int& info1 = m_tmpConstraintSizesPool[i];
00388                                 
00389                                         if (info1)
00390                                         {
00391                                                 int constraintIndex = batchConstraints[i].m_originalConstraintIndex;
00392                                                 int constraintRowOffset = m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraintRowOffsets[constraintIndex];
00393 
00394                                                 b3GpuSolverConstraint* currentConstraintRow = &m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool[constraintRowOffset];
00395                                                 b3GpuGenericConstraint& constraint = m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints[i];
00396 
00397                                                 b3RigidBodyData& rbA = m_gpuData->m_cpuBodies[ constraint.getRigidBodyA()];
00398                                                 //b3RigidBody& rbA = constraint.getRigidBodyA();
00399                 //                              b3RigidBody& rbB = constraint.getRigidBodyB();
00400                                                 b3RigidBodyData& rbB = m_gpuData->m_cpuBodies[ constraint.getRigidBodyB()];
00401                                         
00402                                         
00403 
00404                                                 int solverBodyIdA = constraint.getRigidBodyA();//getOrInitSolverBody(constraint.getRigidBodyA(),bodies,inertias);
00405                                                 int solverBodyIdB = constraint.getRigidBodyB();//getOrInitSolverBody(constraint.getRigidBodyB(),bodies,inertias);
00406 
00407                                                 b3GpuSolverBody* bodyAPtr = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdA];
00408                                                 b3GpuSolverBody* bodyBPtr = &m_tmpSolverBodyPool[solverBodyIdB];
00409 
00410                                                 if (rbA.m_invMass)
00411                                                 {
00412                                                         batchConstraints[i].m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = solverBodyIdA;
00413                                                 } else
00414                                                 {
00415                                                         if (!solverBodyIdA)
00416                                                                 m_staticIdx = 0;
00417                                                         batchConstraints[i].m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = -solverBodyIdA;
00418                                                 }
00419 
00420                                                 if (rbB.m_invMass)
00421                                                 {
00422                                                         batchConstraints[i].m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = solverBodyIdB;
00423                                                 } else
00424                                                 {
00425                                                         if (!solverBodyIdB)
00426                                                                 m_staticIdx = 0;
00427                                                         batchConstraints[i].m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = -solverBodyIdB;
00428                                                 }
00429 
00430 
00431                                                 int overrideNumSolverIterations = 0;//constraint->getOverrideNumSolverIterations() > 0 ? constraint->getOverrideNumSolverIterations() : infoGlobal.m_numIterations;
00432                                                 if (overrideNumSolverIterations>m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations)
00433                                                         m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations = overrideNumSolverIterations;
00434 
00435 
00436                                                 int j;
00437                                                 for ( j=0;j<info1;j++)
00438                                                 {

00470                                                 bodyAPtr->internalGetDeltaLinearVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);

00481                                                 info2.fps = 1.f/infoGlobal.m_timeStep;
00482                                                 info2.erp = infoGlobal.m_erp;
00483                                                 info2.m_J1linearAxis = currentConstraintRow->m_contactNormal;
00484                                                 info2.m_J1angularAxis = currentConstraintRow->m_relpos1CrossNormal;
00485                                                 info2.m_J2linearAxis = 0;
00486                                                 info2.m_J2angularAxis = currentConstraintRow->m_relpos2CrossNormal;
00487                                                 info2.rowskip = sizeof(b3GpuSolverConstraint)/sizeof(b3Scalar);//check this
00489                                                 b3Assert(info2.rowskip*sizeof(b3Scalar)== sizeof(b3GpuSolverConstraint));
00490                                                 info2.m_constraintError = &currentConstraintRow->m_rhs;
00491                                                 currentConstraintRow->m_cfm = infoGlobal.m_globalCfm;
00492                                                 info2.m_damping = infoGlobal.m_damping;
00493                                                 info2.cfm = &currentConstraintRow->m_cfm;
00494                                                 info2.m_lowerLimit = &currentConstraintRow->m_lowerLimit;
00495                                                 info2.m_upperLimit = &currentConstraintRow->m_upperLimit;
00496                                                 info2.m_numIterations = infoGlobal.m_numIterations;
00497                                                 m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints[i].getInfo2(&info2,&m_gpuData->m_cpuBodies[0]);
00498 
00500                                                 for ( j=0;j<info1;j++)
00501                                                 {
00502                                                         b3GpuSolverConstraint& solverConstraint = currentConstraintRow[j];
00503 
00504                                                         if (solverConstraint.m_upperLimit>=m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints[i].getBreakingImpulseThreshold())
00505                                                         {
00506                                                                 solverConstraint.m_upperLimit = m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints[i].getBreakingImpulseThreshold();
00507                                                         }
00508 
00509                                                         if (solverConstraint.m_lowerLimit<=-m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints[i].getBreakingImpulseThreshold())
00510                                                         {
00511                                                                 solverConstraint.m_lowerLimit = -m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints[i].getBreakingImpulseThreshold();
00512                                                         }
00513 
00514         //                                              solverConstraint.m_originalContactPoint = constraint;
00515                                                         
00516                                                         b3Matrix3x3& invInertiaWorldA= m_gpuData->m_cpuInertias[constraint.getRigidBodyA()].m_invInertiaWorld;
00517                                                         {
00518 
00519                                                                 //b3Vector3 angularFactorA(1,1,1);
00520                                                                 const b3Vector3& ftorqueAxis1 = solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal;
00521                                                                 solverConstraint.m_angularComponentA = invInertiaWorldA*ftorqueAxis1;//*angularFactorA;
00522                                                         }
00523                                                 
00524                                                         b3Matrix3x3& invInertiaWorldB= m_gpuData->m_cpuInertias[constraint.getRigidBodyB()].m_invInertiaWorld;
00525                                                         {
00526 
00527                                                                 const b3Vector3& ftorqueAxis2 = solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal;
00528                                                                 solverConstraint.m_angularComponentB = invInertiaWorldB*ftorqueAxis2;//*constraint.getRigidBodyB().getAngularFactor();
00529                                                         }
00530 
00531                                                         {
00532                                                                 //it is ok to use solverConstraint.m_contactNormal instead of -solverConstraint.m_contactNormal
00533                                                                 //because it gets multiplied iMJlB
00534                                                                 b3Vector3 iMJlA = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal*rbA.m_invMass;
00535                                                                 b3Vector3 iMJaA = invInertiaWorldA*solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal;
00536                                                                 b3Vector3 iMJlB = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal*rbB.m_invMass;//sign of normal?
00537                                                                 b3Vector3 iMJaB = invInertiaWorldB*solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal;
00538 
00539                                                                 b3Scalar sum = iMJlA.dot(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal);
00540                                                                 sum += iMJaA.dot(solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal);
00541                                                                 sum += iMJlB.dot(solverConstraint.m_contactNormal);
00542                                                                 sum += iMJaB.dot(solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal);
00543                                                                 b3Scalar fsum = b3Fabs(sum);
00544                                                                 b3Assert(fsum > B3_EPSILON);
00545                                                                 solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv = fsum>B3_EPSILON?b3Scalar(1.)/sum : 0.f;
00546                                                         }
00547 
00548 
00551                                                         {
00552                                                                 b3Scalar rel_vel;
00553                                                                 b3Scalar vel1Dotn = solverConstraint.m_contactNormal.dot(rbA.m_linVel) + solverConstraint.m_relpos1CrossNormal.dot(rbA.m_angVel);
00554                                                                 b3Scalar vel2Dotn = -solverConstraint.m_contactNormal.dot(rbB.m_linVel) + solverConstraint.m_relpos2CrossNormal.dot(rbB.m_angVel);
00555 
00556                                                                 rel_vel = vel1Dotn+vel2Dotn;
00557 
00558                                                                 b3Scalar restitution = 0.f;
00559                                                                 b3Scalar positionalError = solverConstraint.m_rhs;//already filled in by getConstraintInfo2
00560                                                                 b3Scalar        velocityError = restitution - rel_vel * info2.m_damping;
00561                                                                 b3Scalar        penetrationImpulse = positionalError*solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
00562                                                                 b3Scalar        velocityImpulse = velocityError *solverConstraint.m_jacDiagABInv;
00563                                                                 solverConstraint.m_rhs = penetrationImpulse+velocityImpulse;
00564                                                                 solverConstraint.m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;
00565 
00566                                                         }
00567                                                 }
00568 
00569                                         }
00570                                 }
00571 
00572 
00573 
00574                                 m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRows->copyFromHost(m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool);
00575                                 m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1->copyFromHost(m_tmpConstraintSizesPool);
00576 
00577                                 if (m_gpuData->m_batchSizes.size()==0)
00578                                         m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->copyFromHost(batchConstraints);
00579                                 else
00580                                         m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->copyToHost(batchConstraints);
00581 
00582                                 m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies->copyFromHost(m_tmpSolverBodyPool);
00583 
00584 
00585 
00586                         }//end useGpuInfo2
00587 
00588 
00589                 }
00590 
00591 #ifdef B3_SUPPORT_CONTACT_CONSTRAINTS
00592                 {
00593                         int i;
00594 
00595                         for (i=0;i<numManifolds;i++)
00596                         {
00597                                 b3Contact4& manifold = manifoldPtr[i];
00598                                 convertContact(bodies,inertias,&manifold,infoGlobal);
00599                         }
00600                 }
00601 #endif //B3_SUPPORT_CONTACT_CONSTRAINTS
00602         }
00603 
00604 //      b3ContactSolverInfo info = infoGlobal;
00605 
00606 
00607 //      int numNonContactPool = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.size();
00608 //      int numConstraintPool = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
00609 //      int numFrictionPool = m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.size();
00610 
00611 
00612         return 0.f;
00613 
00614 }
00615 
00616 
00617 
00619 __inline void internalApplyImpulse( b3GpuSolverBody* body,  const b3Vector3& linearComponent, const b3Vector3& angularComponent,float impulseMagnitude)
00620 {
00621         body->m_deltaLinearVelocity += linearComponent*impulseMagnitude*body->m_linearFactor;
00622         body->m_deltaAngularVelocity += angularComponent*(impulseMagnitude*body->m_angularFactor);
00623 }
00624 
00625 
00626 void resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric2( b3GpuSolverBody* body1,  b3GpuSolverBody* body2,  b3GpuSolverConstraint* c)
00627 {
00628         float deltaImpulse = c->m_rhs-b3Scalar(c->m_appliedImpulse)*c->m_cfm;
00629         float deltaVel1Dotn     =       b3Dot(c->m_contactNormal,body1->m_deltaLinearVelocity)  + b3Dot(c->m_relpos1CrossNormal,body1->m_deltaAngularVelocity);
00630         float deltaVel2Dotn     =       -b3Dot(c->m_contactNormal,body2->m_deltaLinearVelocity) + b3Dot(c->m_relpos2CrossNormal,body2->m_deltaAngularVelocity);
00631 
00632         deltaImpulse    -=      deltaVel1Dotn*c->m_jacDiagABInv;
00633         deltaImpulse    -=      deltaVel2Dotn*c->m_jacDiagABInv;
00634 
00635         float sum = b3Scalar(c->m_appliedImpulse) + deltaImpulse;
00636         if (sum < c->m_lowerLimit)
00637         {
00638                 deltaImpulse = c->m_lowerLimit-b3Scalar(c->m_appliedImpulse);
00639                 c->m_appliedImpulse = c->m_lowerLimit;
00640         }
00641         else if (sum > c->m_upperLimit) 
00642         {
00643                 deltaImpulse = c->m_upperLimit-b3Scalar(c->m_appliedImpulse);
00644                 c->m_appliedImpulse = c->m_upperLimit;
00645         }
00646         else
00647         {
00648                 c->m_appliedImpulse = sum;
00649         }
00650 
00651         internalApplyImpulse(body1,c->m_contactNormal*body1->m_invMass,c->m_angularComponentA,deltaImpulse);
00652         internalApplyImpulse(body2,-c->m_contactNormal*body2->m_invMass,c->m_angularComponentB,deltaImpulse);
00653 
00654 }
00655 
00656 
00657 
00658 void    b3GpuPgsConstraintSolver::initSolverBody(int bodyIndex, b3GpuSolverBody* solverBody, b3RigidBodyData* rb)
00659 {
00660 
00661         solverBody->m_deltaLinearVelocity.setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00662         solverBody->m_deltaAngularVelocity.setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00663         solverBody->internalGetPushVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00664         solverBody->internalGetTurnVelocity().setValue(0.f,0.f,0.f);
00665 
00666         b3Assert(rb);
00667 //      solverBody->m_worldTransform = getWorldTransform(rb);
00668         solverBody->internalSetInvMass(b3MakeVector3(rb->m_invMass,rb->m_invMass,rb->m_invMass));
00669         solverBody->m_originalBodyIndex = bodyIndex;
00670         solverBody->m_angularFactor = b3MakeVector3(1,1,1);
00671         solverBody->m_linearFactor = b3MakeVector3(1,1,1);
00672         solverBody->m_linearVelocity = getLinearVelocity(rb);
00673         solverBody->m_angularVelocity = getAngularVelocity(rb);
00674 }

00682 b3Scalar b3GpuPgsConstraintSolver::solveGroupCacheFriendlyIterations(b3OpenCLArray<b3GpuGenericConstraint>* gpuConstraints1,int numConstraints,const b3ContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
00683 {
00684         //only create the batches once.
00685         //@todo: incrementally update batches when constraints are added/activated and/or removed/deactivated
00686         B3_PROFILE("GpuSolveGroupCacheFriendlyIterations");
00687 
00688         bool createBatches = m_gpuData->m_batchSizes.size()==0;
00689         {
00690                 
00691                 if (createBatches)
00692                 {
00693                         
00694                         m_gpuData->m_batchSizes.resize(0);
00695 
00696                         {
00697                                 m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->copyToHost(batchConstraints);
00698 
00699                                 B3_PROFILE("batch joints");
00700                                 b3Assert(batchConstraints.size()==numConstraints);
00701                                 int simdWidth =numConstraints+1;
00702                                 int numBodies = m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size();
00703                                 sortConstraintByBatch3( &batchConstraints[0], numConstraints, simdWidth , m_staticIdx,  numBodies);
00704 
00705                                 m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->copyFromHost(batchConstraints);
00706 
00707                         }
00708                 } else
00709                 {
00710                         /*b3AlignedObjectArray<b3BatchConstraint> cpuCheckBatches;
00711                         m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->copyToHost(cpuCheckBatches);
00712                         b3Assert(cpuCheckBatches.size()==batchConstraints.size());
00713                         printf(".\n");
00714                         */
00715                         //>copyFromHost(batchConstraints);
00716                 }
00717                 int maxIterations = infoGlobal.m_numIterations;
00718         
00719                 bool useBatching = true;
00720 
00721                 if (useBatching )
00722                 {
00723                         
00724                         if (!useGpuSolveJointConstraintRows)
00725                         {
00726                                 B3_PROFILE("copy to host");
00727                                 m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies->copyToHost(m_tmpSolverBodyPool);
00728                                 m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->copyToHost(batchConstraints);
00729                                 m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRows->copyToHost(m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool);
00730                                 m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1->copyToHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraintInfo1);
00731                                 m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRowOffsets->copyToHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraintRowOffsets);
00732                                 gpuConstraints1->copyToHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints);
00733 
00734                         }
00735 
00736                         for ( int iteration = 0 ; iteration< maxIterations ; iteration++)
00737                         {
00738                                 
00739                                 int batchOffset = 0;
00740                                 int constraintOffset=0;
00741                                 int numBatches = m_gpuData->m_batchSizes.size();
00742                                 for (int bb=0;bb<numBatches;bb++)
00743                                 {
00744                                         int numConstraintsInBatch = m_gpuData->m_batchSizes[bb];
00745 
00746                                         
00747                                         if (useGpuSolveJointConstraintRows)
00748                                         {
00749                                                 B3_PROFILE("solveJointConstraintRowsKernels");
00750                                         
00751                                                 /*
00752                                                 __kernel void solveJointConstraintRows(__global b3GpuSolverBody* solverBodies,
00753                                           __global b3BatchConstraint* batchConstraints,
00754                                                 __global b3SolverConstraint* rows,
00755                                                 __global unsigned int* numConstraintRowsInfo1, 
00756                                                 __global unsigned int* rowOffsets,
00757                                                 __global b3GpuGenericConstraint* constraints,
00758                                                 int batchOffset,
00759                                                 int numConstraintsInBatch*/
00760 
00761 
00762                                                 b3LauncherCL launcher(m_gpuData->m_queue,m_gpuData->m_solveJointConstraintRowsKernels,"m_solveJointConstraintRowsKernels");
00763                                                 launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies->getBufferCL());
00764                                                 launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->getBufferCL());
00765                                                 launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRows->getBufferCL());
00766                                                 launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1->getBufferCL());
00767                                                 launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRowOffsets->getBufferCL());
00768                                                 launcher.setBuffer(gpuConstraints1->getBufferCL());//to detect disabled constraints
00769                                                 launcher.setConst(batchOffset);
00770                                                 launcher.setConst(numConstraintsInBatch);
00771 
00772                                                 launcher.launch1D(numConstraintsInBatch);
00773                                                 
00774 
00775                                         } else//useGpu
00776                                         {
00777                                                 
00778 
00779                                                 
00780                                                 for (int b=0;b<numConstraintsInBatch;b++)
00781                                                 {
00782                                                         const b3BatchConstraint& c = batchConstraints[batchOffset+b];
00783                                                         /*printf("-----------\n");
00784                                                         printf("bb=%d\n",bb);
00785                                                         printf("c.batchId = %d\n", c.m_batchId);
00786                                                         */
00787                                                         b3Assert(c.m_batchId==bb);
00788                                                         b3GpuGenericConstraint* constraint = &m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints[c.m_originalConstraintIndex];
00789                                                         if (constraint->m_flags&B3_CONSTRAINT_FLAG_ENABLED)
00790                                                         {
00791                                                                 int numConstraintRows = m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraintInfo1[c.m_originalConstraintIndex];
00792                                                                 int constraintOffset = m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraintRowOffsets[c.m_originalConstraintIndex];
00793                                                                 
00794                                                                 for (int jj=0;jj<numConstraintRows;jj++)
00795                                                                 {
00796         //                                                      
00797                                                                         b3GpuSolverConstraint& constraint = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool[constraintOffset+jj];
00798                                                                         //resolveSingleConstraintRowGenericSIMD(m_tmpSolverBodyPool[constraint.m_solverBodyIdA],m_tmpSolverBodyPool[constraint.m_solverBodyIdB],constraint);
00799                                                                         resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric2(&m_tmpSolverBodyPool[constraint.m_solverBodyIdA],&m_tmpSolverBodyPool[constraint.m_solverBodyIdB],&constraint);
00800                                                                 }
00801                                                         }
00802                                                 }
00803                                         }//useGpu
00804                                         batchOffset+=numConstraintsInBatch;
00805                                         constraintOffset+=numConstraintsInBatch;
00806                                 }
00807                         }//for (int iteration...
00808 
00809                         if (!useGpuSolveJointConstraintRows)
00810                         {
00811                                 {
00812                                         B3_PROFILE("copy from host");
00813                                         m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies->copyFromHost(m_tmpSolverBodyPool);
00814                                         m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->copyFromHost(batchConstraints);
00815                                         m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRows->copyFromHost(m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool);
00816                                 }
00817 
00818                                 //B3_PROFILE("copy to host");
00819                                 //m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies->copyToHost(m_tmpSolverBodyPool);
00820                         }
00821                         //int sz = sizeof(b3GpuSolverBody);
00822                         //printf("cpu sizeof(b3GpuSolverBody)=%d\n",sz);
00823 
00824                         
00825                         
00826 
00827 
00828                 } else
00829                 {
00830                         for ( int iteration = 0 ; iteration< maxIterations ; iteration++)
00831                         {                       
00832                                 int numJoints =                 m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.size();
00833                                 for (int j=0;j<numJoints;j++)
00834                                 {
00835                                         b3GpuSolverConstraint& constraint = m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool[j];
00836                                         resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric2(&m_tmpSolverBodyPool[constraint.m_solverBodyIdA],&m_tmpSolverBodyPool[constraint.m_solverBodyIdB],&constraint);
00837                                 }
00838 
00839                                 if (!m_usePgs)
00840                                 {
00841                                         averageVelocities();
00842                                 }
00843                         }
00844                 }
00845                 
00846         }
00847         clFinish(m_gpuData->m_queue);
00848         return 0.f;
00849 }

00851 
00852 
00853 
00854 static b3AlignedObjectArray<int> bodyUsed;
00855 static b3AlignedObjectArray<int> curUsed;
00856 
00857 
00858 
00859 inline int b3GpuPgsConstraintSolver::sortConstraintByBatch3( b3BatchConstraint* cs, int numConstraints, int simdWidth , int staticIdx, int numBodies)
00860 {
00861         //int sz = sizeof(b3BatchConstraint);
00862 
00863         B3_PROFILE("sortConstraintByBatch3");
00864         
00865         static int maxSwaps = 0;
00866         int numSwaps = 0;
00867 
00868         curUsed.resize(2*simdWidth);
00869 
00870         static int maxNumConstraints = 0;
00871         if (maxNumConstraints<numConstraints)
00872         {
00873                 maxNumConstraints = numConstraints;
00874                 //printf("maxNumConstraints  = %d\n",maxNumConstraints );
00875         }
00876 
00877         int numUsedArray = numBodies/32+1;
00878         bodyUsed.resize(numUsedArray);
00879 
00880         for (int q=0;q<numUsedArray;q++)
00881                 bodyUsed[q]=0;
00882 
00883         
00884         int curBodyUsed = 0;
00885 
00886         int numIter = 0;
00887     
00888                 
00889 #if defined(_DEBUG)
00890         for(int i=0; i<numConstraints; i++)
00891                 cs[i].m_batchId = -1;
00892 #endif
00893         
00894         int numValidConstraints = 0;
00895 //      int unprocessedConstraintIndex = 0;
00896 
00897         int batchIdx = 0;
00898     
00899 
00900         {
00901                 B3_PROFILE("cpu batch innerloop");
00902                 
00903                 while( numValidConstraints < numConstraints)
00904                 {
00905                         numIter++;
00906                         int nCurrentBatch = 0;
00907                         //      clear flag
00908                         for(int i=0; i<curBodyUsed; i++) 
00909                                 bodyUsed[curUsed[i]/32] = 0;
00910 
00911             curBodyUsed = 0;
00912 
00913                         for(int i=numValidConstraints; i<numConstraints; i++)
00914                         {
00915                                 int idx = i;
00916                                 b3Assert( idx < numConstraints );
00917                                 //      check if it can go
00918                                 int bodyAS = cs[idx].m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit;
00919                                 int bodyBS = cs[idx].m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit;
00920                                 int bodyA = abs(bodyAS);
00921                                 int bodyB = abs(bodyBS);
00922                                 bool aIsStatic = (bodyAS<0) || bodyAS==staticIdx;
00923                                 bool bIsStatic = (bodyBS<0) || bodyBS==staticIdx;
00924                                 int aUnavailable = 0;
00925                                 int bUnavailable = 0;
00926                                 if (!aIsStatic)
00927                                 {
00928                                         aUnavailable = bodyUsed[ bodyA/32 ] & (1<<(bodyA&31));
00929                                 }
00930                                 if (!aUnavailable)
00931                                 if (!bIsStatic)
00932                                 {
00933                                         bUnavailable = bodyUsed[ bodyB/32 ] & (1<<(bodyB&31));
00934                                 }
00935                 
00936                                 if( aUnavailable==0 && bUnavailable==0 ) // ok
00937                                 {
00938                                         if (!aIsStatic)
00939                                         {
00940                                                 bodyUsed[ bodyA/32 ] |= (1<<(bodyA&31));
00941                                                 curUsed[curBodyUsed++]=bodyA;
00942                                         }
00943                                         if (!bIsStatic)
00944                                         {
00945                                                 bodyUsed[ bodyB/32 ] |= (1<<(bodyB&31));
00946                                                 curUsed[curBodyUsed++]=bodyB;
00947                                         }
00948 
00949                                         cs[idx].m_batchId = batchIdx;
00950 
00951                                         if (i!=numValidConstraints)
00952                                         {
00953                                                 b3Swap(cs[i],cs[numValidConstraints]);
00954                                                 numSwaps++;
00955                                         }
00956 
00957                                         numValidConstraints++;
00958                                         {
00959                                                 nCurrentBatch++;
00960                                                 if( nCurrentBatch == simdWidth )
00961                                                 {
00962                                                         nCurrentBatch = 0;
00963                                                         for(int i=0; i<curBodyUsed; i++) 
00964                                                                 bodyUsed[curUsed[i]/32] = 0;
00965                                                         curBodyUsed = 0;
00966                                                 }
00967                                         }
00968                                 }
00969                         }
00970                         m_gpuData->m_batchSizes.push_back(nCurrentBatch);
00971                         batchIdx ++;
00972                 }
00973         }
00974         
00975 #if defined(_DEBUG)
00976     //          debugPrintf( "nBatches: %d\n", batchIdx );
00977         for(int i=0; i<numConstraints; i++)
00978     {
00979         b3Assert( cs[i].m_batchId != -1 );
00980     }
00981 #endif
00982 
00983         if (maxSwaps<numSwaps)
00984         {
00985                 maxSwaps = numSwaps;
00986                 //printf("maxSwaps = %d\n", maxSwaps);
00987         }
00988         
00989         return batchIdx;
00990 }
00991 
00992 
00994 b3Scalar b3GpuPgsConstraintSolver::solveGroup(b3OpenCLArray<b3RigidBodyData>* gpuBodies, b3OpenCLArray<b3InertiaData>* gpuInertias, 
00995                                 int numBodies, b3OpenCLArray<b3GpuGenericConstraint>* gpuConstraints,int numConstraints, const b3ContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
00996 {
00997 
00998         B3_PROFILE("solveJoints");
00999         //you need to provide at least some bodies
01000         
01001         solveGroupCacheFriendlySetup( gpuBodies, gpuInertias,numBodies,gpuConstraints, numConstraints,infoGlobal);
01002 
01003         solveGroupCacheFriendlyIterations(gpuConstraints, numConstraints,infoGlobal);
01004 
01005         solveGroupCacheFriendlyFinish(gpuBodies, gpuInertias,numBodies, gpuConstraints, numConstraints, infoGlobal);
01006         
01007         return 0.f;
01008 }
01009 
01010 void    b3GpuPgsConstraintSolver::solveJoints(int numBodies, b3OpenCLArray<b3RigidBodyData>* gpuBodies, b3OpenCLArray<b3InertiaData>* gpuInertias, 
01011                                 int numConstraints, b3OpenCLArray<b3GpuGenericConstraint>* gpuConstraints)
01012 {
01013         b3ContactSolverInfo infoGlobal;
01014         infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse = false;
01015         infoGlobal.m_timeStep = 1.f/60.f;
01016         infoGlobal.m_numIterations = 4;//4;
01017 //      infoGlobal.m_solverMode|=B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS|B3_SOLVER_INTERLEAVE_CONTACT_AND_FRICTION_CONSTRAINTS|B3_SOLVER_DISABLE_VELOCITY_DEPENDENT_FRICTION_DIRECTION;
01018         //infoGlobal.m_solverMode|=B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS|B3_SOLVER_INTERLEAVE_CONTACT_AND_FRICTION_CONSTRAINTS;
01019         infoGlobal.m_solverMode|=B3_SOLVER_USE_2_FRICTION_DIRECTIONS;

01032 b3Scalar b3GpuPgsConstraintSolver::solveGroupCacheFriendlyFinish(b3OpenCLArray<b3RigidBodyData>* gpuBodies,b3OpenCLArray<b3InertiaData>* gpuInertias,int numBodies,b3OpenCLArray<b3GpuGenericConstraint>* gpuConstraints,int numConstraints,const b3ContactSolverInfo& infoGlobal)
01033 {
01034         B3_PROFILE("solveGroupCacheFriendlyFinish");
01035 //      int numPoolConstraints = m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.size();
01036 //      int i,j;
01037 
01038 
01039         {
01040                 if (gpuBreakConstraints)
01041                 {
01042                         B3_PROFILE("breakViolatedConstraintsKernel");
01043                         b3LauncherCL launcher(m_gpuData->m_queue,m_gpuData->m_breakViolatedConstraintsKernel,"m_breakViolatedConstraintsKernel");
01044                         launcher.setBuffer(gpuConstraints->getBufferCL());
01045                         launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1->getBufferCL());
01046                         launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRowOffsets->getBufferCL());
01047                         launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRows->getBufferCL());
01048                         launcher.setConst(numConstraints);
01049                         launcher.launch1D(numConstraints);
01050                 } else
01051                 {
01052                         gpuConstraints->copyToHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints);
01053                         m_gpuData->m_gpuBatchConstraints->copyToHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuBatchConstraints);
01054                         m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRows->copyToHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraintRows);
01055                         gpuConstraints->copyToHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints);
01056                         m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintInfo1->copyToHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraintInfo1);
01057                         m_gpuData->m_gpuConstraintRowOffsets->copyToHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraintRowOffsets);
01058 
01059                         for (int cid=0;cid<numConstraints;cid++)
01060                         {
01061                                 int originalConstraintIndex = batchConstraints[cid].m_originalConstraintIndex;
01062                                 int constraintRowOffset = m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraintRowOffsets[originalConstraintIndex];
01063                                 int numRows = m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraintInfo1[originalConstraintIndex];
01064                                 if (numRows)
01065                                 {
01066                 
01067                                 //      printf("cid=%d, breakingThreshold =%f\n",cid,breakingThreshold);
01068                                         for (int i=0;i<numRows;i++)
01069                                         {
01070                                                 int rowIndex =constraintRowOffset+i;
01071                                                 int orgConstraintIndex = m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraintRows[rowIndex].m_originalConstraintIndex;
01072                                                 float breakingThreshold = m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints[orgConstraintIndex].m_breakingImpulseThreshold;
01073                                         //      printf("rows[%d].m_appliedImpulse=%f\n",rowIndex,rows[rowIndex].m_appliedImpulse);
01074                                                 if (b3Fabs(m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraintRows[rowIndex].m_appliedImpulse) >= breakingThreshold)
01075                                                 {
01076 
01077                                                         m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints[orgConstraintIndex].m_flags =0;//&= ~B3_CONSTRAINT_FLAG_ENABLED;
01078                                                 }
01079                                         }
01080                                 }
01081                         }
01082 
01083 
01084                         gpuConstraints->copyFromHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuConstraints);
01085                 }
01086         }
01087 
01088         {
01089                 if (useGpuWriteBackVelocities)
01090                 {
01091                         B3_PROFILE("GPU write back velocities and transforms");
01092 
01093                         b3LauncherCL launcher(m_gpuData->m_queue,m_gpuData->m_writeBackVelocitiesKernel,"m_writeBackVelocitiesKernel");
01094                         launcher.setBuffer(gpuBodies->getBufferCL());
01095                         launcher.setBuffer(m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies->getBufferCL());
01096                         launcher.setConst(numBodies);
01097                         launcher.launch1D(numBodies);
01098                         clFinish(m_gpuData->m_queue);
01099 //                      m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies->copyToHost(m_tmpSolverBodyPool);
01100 //                      m_gpuData->m_gpuBodies->copyToHostPointer(bodies,numBodies);
01101                         //m_gpuData->m_gpuBodies->copyToHost(testBodies);
01102 
01103                 } 
01104                 else
01105                 {
01106                         B3_PROFILE("CPU write back velocities and transforms");
01107 
01108                         m_gpuData->m_gpuSolverBodies->copyToHost(m_tmpSolverBodyPool);
01109                         gpuBodies->copyToHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuBodies);
01110                         for ( int i=0;i<m_tmpSolverBodyPool.size();i++)
01111                         {
01112                                 int bodyIndex = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_originalBodyIndex;
01113                                 //printf("bodyIndex=%d\n",bodyIndex);
01114                                 b3Assert(i==bodyIndex);
01115 
01116                                 b3RigidBodyData* body = &m_gpuData->m_cpuBodies[bodyIndex];
01117                                 if (body->m_invMass)
01118                                 {
01119                                         if (infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse)
01120                                                 m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].writebackVelocityAndTransform(infoGlobal.m_timeStep, infoGlobal.m_splitImpulseTurnErp);
01121                                         else
01122                                                 m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].writebackVelocity();
01123 
01124                                         if (m_usePgs)
01125                                         {
01126                                                 body->m_linVel = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_linearVelocity;
01127                                                 body->m_angVel = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_angularVelocity;
01128                                         } else
01129                                         {
01130                                                 b3Assert(0);
01131                                         }
01132         /*                      
01133                                         if (infoGlobal.m_splitImpulse)
01134                                         {
01135                                                 body->m_pos = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_worldTransform.getOrigin();
01136                                                 b3Quaternion orn;
01137                                                 orn = m_tmpSolverBodyPool[i].m_worldTransform.getRotation();
01138                                                 body->m_quat = orn;
01139                                         }
01140                                         */
01141                                 }
01142                         }//for
01143 
01144                         gpuBodies->copyFromHost(m_gpuData->m_cpuBodies);
01145 
01146                 }
01147         }
01148 
01149         clFinish(m_gpuData->m_queue);
01150 
01151         m_tmpSolverContactConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01152         m_tmpSolverNonContactConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01153         m_tmpSolverContactFrictionConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01154         m_tmpSolverContactRollingFrictionConstraintPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01155 
01156         m_tmpSolverBodyPool.resizeNoInitialize(0);
01157         return 0.f;
01158 }
